pages.text: Luminis ore can be rarely found in lower levels around your world. It is quite common to find it up to 20 or so blocks above bedrock, and the ore will drop luminis crysals. While in the crystal ore form, it tends to emit a faint glow.
When smelted, the luminis solidifies and begins to give off a glow. This material is believed to be what gives shiny buddycards their shine, and is also useful for making perfect buddysteel.
